data.name: Combat Complex
data.detailed_description:
Combat Complex is a fast-paced sci-fi action RPG. You are alone, facing hordes of enemies, wielding legendary guns and armor. Locked in your augmented body are devastating skills and talents, but you have to unlock them by leveling up. Think quick, move fast!

HORDES OF ENEMIES

Prepare to get overwhelmed.

TURN YOUR ENEMIES' ATTACKS AGAINST THEM

Lure them into their own lasers, or pull them into their own exploding bombs. Get creative!

LEGENDARY LOOT

Rare, epic, and legendary loot – railguns, pulse rifles, drone launchers, and more!

STATS, SKILLS, AND TALENTS

Level up and become a hard-to-kill tank, a deadly glass cannon, or a space wizard!

NOT A ROGUELIKE

Combat Complex is not a roguelike – you keep your progress.

RANDOMLY-GENERATED LEVELS

No level is the same. Levels and maps are randomly generated to keep the challenge fresh.

SKILL IS EVERYTHING

It's not just about your stats. You'll need lightning-fast reflexes and quick thinking to survive.

data.short_description: Combat Complex is a fast-paced sci-fi action RPG. You are alone against hordes of enemies. Wield legendary weapons, level up your stats, unlock devastating talents and abilities. Think quick, move fast, outsmart your enemies!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1070 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
